updates.text: We will be conducting maintenance works on the Sengkang LRT system this Sunday, 16 Aug 2020. Train service will operate as usual on one platform while the other will be closed for works. Service on both platforms will commence as usual on Monday, 17 Aug.

Maintenance works will be conducted on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT systems on Sundays, from 26 July to 6 September (except 9 August). Train service will continue to operate as usual on one platform, while the other platform will start service at 5pm.
